IUCN Academy

What is IUCN Academy ?

IUCN is launching its IUCN Academy to harness IUCN expertise and provide training to those seeking to make their contributions more meaningful within the dynamic world of conservation.

Learn more

News

04 July 2021

"The Future of Work in Conservation" - Official launch event of the IUCN Academy during World Conservation Congress

As the work environment is becoming more and more dynamic, conservationists profiles and ways of working are also evolving quickly. Join us at WCC (in person or online) for a discussion with IUCN Director General and IUCN Academy Academic Partners on this important topic.

Join

Academic partners

As the IUCN Academy will develop its activities fostering an interdisciplinary approach to nature conservation, it is proud to partner with a group of academic institutions well known for their work in the broader field of sustainable development.

Seed partners

Ministry of Environment - Republic of Korea

We thank the Republic of Korea who is providing seed funding for the launch of the IUCN Academy in this critical phase of its development.

Opigno LMS

IUCN Academy is thankful to Opigno for supporting the initiative through the provision of sponsorship and expertise for the design of the iucnacademy.org learning platform currently under development.
